description: The blue whale is the largest animal on the planet, weighing as much as 200 tons (approximately 33 elephants). The blue whale has a heart the size of a Volkswagen Beetle. Its stomach can hold one ton of krill and it needs to eat about four tons of krill each day.

image.description: Whale in blue depth of ocean by Elianne Dipp (Pexels)

model.description: Blue Whale - Textured by Bohdan Lvov
